ch0126_40_haruka/0101_0701_02_10:
Looks like we’re in for a busy day! Let’s head
out already!
ch0126_40_haruka/7101_0701_01_10:
Isn’t this outfit cute? I especially like
this headband.
ch0126_40_haruka/7101_0701_02_10:
When I wear it, I feel like I can understand my
partner Pokémon better!
ch0126_40_haruka/7102_0701_01_10:
Lopunny is so soft and cute—no wonder she’s so
popular with girls!
ch0126_40_haruka/7102_0701_02_10:
On top of all that, she’s super powerful in battles!
She’s very reliable.
ch0126_40_haruka/7102_0701_03_10:
My partner is the cutest, strongest Pokémon ever!
I’m so proud of her!
ch0126_40_haruka/7103_0701_01_10:
These decorated eggs are just small eggs that we
can draw on...
ch0126_40_haruka/7103_0701_02_10:
but their surfaces are so round that my pen slips.
I’m worried if I use too much force, I might crack
the shell...
ch0126_40_haruka/7103_0701_03_10:
Want to try decorating one with me? If you figure
out a good way to draw on these eggs, can you
teach me, too?
ch0126_40_haruka/7104_0701_01_10:
Earlier, I met a Trainer who couldn’t find their
partner Pokémon.
ch0126_40_haruka/7104_0701_02_10: But I’m so glad we were able to reunite them!
ch0126_40_haruka/7104_0701_03_10:
Events are more fun when you can spend them
with your friends, after all.
ch0126_40_haruka/7104_0701_04_10: Why don’t we go check out an event together?
ch0126_40_haruka/7105_0701_01_10:
Seeing all those beautifully decorated eggs around
town is exciting!
ch0126_40_haruka/7105_0701_02_10:
They’re dyed all sorts of colors, and they have the
most intricate designs...
ch0126_40_haruka/7105_0701_03_10:
If you were gonna decorate an egg, how would
you go about it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0126_40_haruka/1701_0702_01_10:
This is something I found while out doing
fieldwork. You can have it!
ch0126_40_haruka/1701_0702_02_10: I hope you like it! That would make me happy!
ch0126_40_haruka/2501_0701_01_10:
What a fun event! There are colorful
decorations everywhere!
ch0126_40_haruka/2501_0701_02_10:
I tried to draw you and your partner on an
egg, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0126_40_haruka/2501_0701_03_10:
But I’m still trying to get it just right! I’ll show it to
you when I draw it a little better!
ch0126_40_haruka/2501_0702_01_10: Hm? You wanna see it now?
ch0126_40_haruka/2501_0702_02_10:
If you say so! But don’t laugh if it doesn’t look
that great, OK?
ch0126_40_haruka/2511_0701_01_10: I got a Pokémon Egg! I wanna raise it, but...
ch0126_40_haruka/2511_0701_02_10:
I don’t really have much experience with that.
I’m a little worried whether I can do it properly...
ch0126_40_haruka/2511_0702_02_10: So you probably know more about it than I do.
ch0126_40_haruka/2511_0702_03_10: Please give me any tips you can!
ch0126_40_haruka/3001_0701_01_10:
I love that feeling you get when you say good
morning to someone and they smile and say it
right back!
ch0126_40_haruka/3003_0701_01_10:
If we find a real Pokémon Egg out there, I wanna
snuggle up next to it and keep it warm!
ch0126_40_haruka/3005_0701_01_10:
Time flies when you’re having fun, huh...
I should head to bed soon! Hope to see you
again tomorrow!
